description:
As a user
    I want to access the dashboard page
    So that I can view my account information and data
name: Account Details Page Functionality

elements.name: Adding,add more filter, Clear filter and Search ,Update and Delete new account of Account Details page

steps.name: I should navigate to application
I should Sign In into the application
close the terms of service window
I should click on Add New button
Verify the tilte of Add New Contact page
Enter title, full name and valid Email
Enter Phone and Cell Number
Select User Role and Building from Dropdown List

steps.name: Click on save button
Verify the account details added in table
Click on More filters
Select Field name and Field operation
Enter the Search value in search box
Click on Apply Button
Verify the Results in the table
Click on Clear filter
Enter the full name in search box
Verify the record in searching history
Click on Edit Icon
I should edit title, full name
I should edit Phone and Cell Number and user role
I edit User Status to inactive
Click on Submit button
Verify the Record has been updated Meassage
Click on Delete Icon
Click on Confirm Delete button
Verify the record is deleted successfully
